channel.title: I need a source that i can host easily on my mac
channel.description: Ever source i seem to download does not work correctly on my mac. I know how to start a server and host on a mac but when i go to javac *.java it can never find everything. So please can someone show me a client and source i can run from my mac easily!

pmd

item.source: I need a source that i can host easily on my mac

item.title: I need a source that i can host easily on my mac
item.dc:creator: @BabyMaker BabyMaker
item.description:
@BabyMaker wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Every server can be used on a mac, Java is NOT platform specific. You will just need to make a few minor edits in order to run the server, mac’s I don’t believe can run Windows Batch Files.

Ya they cannot run batch files. But what i was wondering is what are those minor edits. If you could help that would be great!

Read full topic
